EmailTemplate.subject: Final reminder: HeadStart Employment Opportunities
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Hi name.
This is a reminder about the latest HeadStart exclusive opportunities only available to you. Make sure you register your interest today! Once registered, we will be in touch with all the details.
Celebrate your success and gain a massive ‘HeadStart’ You told us you wanted to enhance your employability skills, so we have designed our next big event to do just that!
All this and so much more will be available to you totally free so take full advantage of our expert advice.
Want paid work experience with Berkeley Group during February half term?
Then register your interest below to attend their workshop this side of Christmas. At the workshop, you will learn more about the different departments within Berkeley and the type of work experience you will have. Interviews will be held on 9th January 2016. This is a fantastic opportunity and not one to be missed.
Look forward to hearing from you.
HeadStart
If you have any queries, please email headstart@the-challenge.org
